title: Analyze Quarterly Market Trends
description: An agent wants to create a quarterly market report for their client newsletter.

tasks.description: Retrieve MLS data for the last quarter for a specific zip code (e.g., median sales price, days on market, inventory levels).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pulls the key market statistics from the MLS.

tasks.description: Compare the data to the previous quarter and the same quarter last year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the percentage change for key metrics to identify trends.

tasks.description: Generate charts and write a brief summary of the market trends for the newsletter.
tasks.expected_outcome: A summary with data visualizations is created, ready for inclusion in marketing materials.
